name: （测试用）特训：隐秘击倒之影
desc: 雇佣兵突袭者特殊训练项目：完成击倒后，获得再移动4格，伤害提高20%。

name: 特训：不屈意志
desc: 铃兰之剑特殊训练项目：受到致死伤害时，保留1血不死，并获得物攻提高II，魔攻提高II，持续1回合，一场战斗只能触发1次

name: Critical Training
desc: Grants bonus Crit by 25%.

name: Tetanus
desc: When dealing DMG, single-target attack inflicts 2 stacks of [Infection] on the target.

name: Off-Turn Boost
desc: When it's not the character's turn, DMG dealt is increased by 30%.

name: Armor Polishing
desc: At the start of the battle, gains a [Physical Shield] equal to 30% HP.

name: Impending Doom
desc: Inflicts 2 random [Level 2 Debuffs] on the target after attacking when it's not their turn. The effect lasts 2 rounds.

name: HP Enhancement
desc: HP and Healing Effect are increased by 20%.

name: Attack Enhancement
desc: Increases ATK by 15%.

name: Defense Enhancement
desc: P.DEF and M.DEF are increased by 30%.

name: Morale Training
desc: At the start of the battle, all allies within 3 tiles additionally restore 1 NRG.

name: Professional Healer
desc: Effect of Healing is increased by 25%.

name: Deadly Step
desc: Increases Movement by 1 tile. Can Move Again after defeating a target. The distance moved is based on [Remaining Movement].

name: Cruel Words
desc: At the end of the turn, inflicts [Dullness] to 1 random enemy within 5 tiles. Applies [<sprite=1>Reaction Skill] to the target. When taking Crit DMG, the target will be inflicted with [Stun], which lasts 2 rounds.

name: Collateral Damage
desc: Grants 45% bonus Crit.

name: Born in Shadow
desc: When initiating a [Back Attack], gain 30% bonus Crit. Gain [Act Again] after defeating an enemy. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round and has a CD of 2 turns.

name: Flame Engraving
desc: At the start of the turn, inflicts [Scorch] on 2 random enemies within 3 tiles. The effect lasts 2 rounds.

name: Witchcraft Curse
desc: After DMG is dealt, if the target has [Scorch], inflicts 1 stack of [Laceration]. If the target has [Infection], inflicts 1 stack of [Laceration].

name: Pain Trap
desc: If DMG is dealt to the enemy on their turn, 3 stacks of [Infection] will be inflicted on the target.

name: Wait for Windfalls
desc: When it's not their turn, each enemy defeated grants the character 3 NRG and reduces the CD of skills by 2 turns.

name: Bloodthirst Counter
desc: When initiating a Strike Back, gain 30% bonus ATK and 30% [Life Steal].

name: Full Capacity
desc: When performing [Alert] or using skills that require time to Prepare, gain 40% bonus ATK.

name: Heroic and Zeal
desc: Grants 50% bonus ATK when launching a [Assisting Attack] or a [Assisting Revenge].

name: Special Armor
desc: At the end of the turn, grants all allies within 3 tiles a [Physical Shield] equal to 15% of the character's HP. The shield last 1 round.

name: Front Toward Enemy
desc: Grants all allies with a [Shield] within 3 tiles [3 DMG Reflection].

name: Armored Warrior
desc: When attacking with an active [Shield], gains [<sprite=2>Attack 3], which lasts 1 round.

name: Insult to Injury
desc: Gains 30% bonus Crit and Crit DMG if target has 3 or more [Debuffs].

name: Curse Burst
desc: Before initiating a Ranged Attack, inflicts 2 random [Level 2 Debuffs] on the target, which last 1 round. After attacking, the duration of all [Debuffs] on the target will be extended by 1 turn.

name: Calculated Trajectory
desc: Increases the range of Ranged Skills by 1 tile.

name: Remote Lock
desc: If the distance to the target is greater than 4 tiles (the adjacent tile does not count) when attacking, ignores 50% of the target's DEF. Before attacking, applies [<sprite=1>Passive Skill] and [<sprite=1>Dodge]. The effects last 1 round.

name: Sniper Training
desc: For every 1 tile (the adjacent tile does not count) between the character and the target when attacking, deals 8% more DMG, up to a maximum of 80%.

name: Strong Physique
desc: Gains [Toughness]. After dealing Crit DMG, grants a [Physical Shield] equal to 40% of lost HP.

name: Crushing Axe
desc: When the character's HP exceeds that of the target, deals 35% more DMG.

name: Rescue Training
desc: Gains [Resolve] before launching [Assisting Cover].

name: Rear Tactics
desc: When using [Healing] skills, reduces the CD of skills of the character for 1 turn and extends range by 1 tile.

name: Guard with Care
desc: Grants [3 DMG Reduction] on all [Unharmed] characters within 3 tiles.

name: Overall Treatment
desc: After healing the target, 1 NRG will be restored to the target. The effect can be triggered up to 2 times per round.

name: Emergency Training
desc: At the start of the turn, heals [Dying] allies within in 3 tiles for 40% lost HP.

name: Movement Enhancement
desc: At the end of the turn, grants 2 random allies within 3 tiles [<sprite=2>Move 2], which lasts 1 round.

name: Charge Attack
desc: For each tile traversed before attacking, deals 8% more DMG. This effect can stack.

name: Somersault Training
desc: Jump over enemies without consuming [Movement]. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round. After jumping over an enemy, ignore [Assisting Cover] when attacking.

name: Spirit Enhancement
desc: At the start of the turn, dispels 2 [Debuffs] on the character, restores 10% HP and grants 1 [Level 1 Buff], which lasts 2 rounds.

name: Mainstay
desc: For every 1 [Buff], increases DEF by 15%, up to a maximum of 75%.

name: Sound of Thunder
desc: At the start of the battle, every 1% Crit increases Crit DMG by 1%.

name: Might Doubled
desc: Gains [Jump] and [Climb]. If the characters moves from one tile to another with a height difference of more than 2 tiles before attacking, gain 45% bonus Crit and ignore 30% of the target's DEF.

name: Special Physical Training
desc: When dealing Crit DMG, grants a 50% chance to gain [Dodge]for 1 turn, and restores 30% HP and 1 NRG.

name: Spectral Decay
desc: After initiating an AoE Attack, inflicts [Scorch] and [Life Loss] on the targets. At the end of the turn, deals DMG equal to 30% of the targets' lost HP to enemies who have [Scorch] within 5 tiles around the character.

name: Rusty Textures
desc: When DMG is dealt, inflicts 2 stacks of [Infection] and [Laceration] on the target.

name: Strike Back Master
desc: Increases the Strike Back Count per round by 1, and strike backs deal 40% more DMG.

name: Vigilance Training
desc: Increases the times of Alert can be triggered during each round of the battle by 1. When Alert triggers, deal 40% more DMG.

name: Getting Rid of
desc: Increases the number of [Assisting Attack] during each round of the battle by 1. Assisting Attacks deal bonus DMG equal to 30% of the target's lost HP.

name: Flow Focus
desc: After using skills that require time to Prepare, Restore the CD and gain 2 NRG.

name: Shield Holding Training
desc: All allies within 3 tiles take 25% less DMG if they have a [Physical Shield]. The effect can stack.

name: Shield Attack Master
desc: Each [Physical Shield] grants the character 20% bonus DMG dealt, up to a maximum of 100%.

name: Spirit Shield
desc: After receiving DMG, gain a [Physical Shield] equal to 20% HP. The Shield lasts 1 round.

name: Salt-Upon-Wounds
desc: At the start of the turn, inflicts 2 [Level 3 Debuffs] on enemies who have [Scorch] or [Infection] within 5 tiles. The effects last 2 rounds.

name: Knot Master
desc: After DMG is dealt, gain a 40% chance to inflict 1 random [Bound] on the target. The effect lasts 1 round.

name: Fatal trial
desc: When attacking enemies afflicted with [Control], deal 80% more DMG.

name: Long Shot Training
desc: All allies within 3 tiles deal 5% more DMG with their [Ranged] Single-target Skills and their range is extended by 1 tile. The effect can stack.

name: Concentration Training
desc: If there is no enemy within 4 tiles around, gain 30% bonus ATK and 2 random [Level 2 Buffs] at the start of each round. The effects last 2 rounds.

name: Fury of the Scar
desc: Increases ATK by 50% of the character's missing HP.

name: Perseverance
desc: If [Injured] at the start of the turn, gain a [Physical Shield] equal to 80% of missing HP. The Shield lasts 1 round.

name: Life Fighter
desc: Before initiating an Active Attack, sacrifice 18% current HP to gain 40% bonus ATK.

name: Doctor also Friend
desc: After healing an ally, the character and the target gain [<sprite=2>3 Attack], [<sprite=2>2 P.DEF] and [<sprite=2>2 M.DEF]. The effects last 1 round.

name: Full of Energy
desc: Increases original NRG by 2. Every 1 NRG in that the character has while in battle increases DMG by 10%, up to a maximum of 50%.

name: Cooking Training
desc: At the start of the turn, heals all allies within 3 tiles for 20% HP and dispels 1 [Debuff].

name: Schadenfreude
desc: When any enemy is defeated within 5 tiles, restores 30% lost HP and 1 NRG. Additionally restores 1 NRG when defeating a target.

name: Ambush Kill
desc: If DMG isn't dealt until the end of the turn, for each point of Movement, increases Crit and Crit DMG by 10%, up to a maximum of 100%. The effect lasts 1 round.

name: Guerrilla Expertise
desc: If the distance moved and [charge] is no less than 5 tiles (the adjacent tile does not count), gain [<sprite=2>4 Attack] and [Armor Piercing]. The effects last 1 round.

name: Outbreak Training
desc: At the start of the battle, all allies within 3 tiles gain 10% bonus ATK and DEF, as well as 2 tiles bonus Movement. The effect lasts 2 rounds and can stack.

name: Team Encouragement
desc: At the end of the turn, grants 2 random allies within 3 tiles [<sprite=2>2 DMG], [2 DMG Reduction] and [<sprite=2>2 Crit DMG]. The effects last 2 rounds.

name: Bloodlust
desc: When defeating an enemy, restore 50% lost HP and gain 10% bonus ATK and Crit, up to a maximum of 30%. The effect lasts 1 round.

name: High Spirits
desc: If the character has 6 or more [Buffs], deals 60% more DMG.

name: End up Killing
desc: Character can [Act Again] after dealing Crit DMG. The effect cannot stack and has a CD of 3 turns. If Crit DMG is dealt during the CD, the skill CD will be reduced by 1 turn.

name: Force Flare
desc: On [Standby], gain 60% bonus Crit and Crit DMG, ignoring 60% of the target's DEF when attacking. The effect lasts 1 round.

name: Infection Thrashing
desc: When attacking enemies who have [Infection], deals bonus DMG equal to 30% HP and triggers the effect of [Infection] immediately, without removing the stacks of [Infection].

name: Death Blast
desc: Skills dealing [Fire][AoE DMG] change the tiles into [Burning]. When attacking enemies inflicted by [Scorch], gain 30% bonus Crit and 50% bonus Crit DMG.

name: Play it Safe
desc: Take 70% less DMG if the attacker has [Scorch] and [Infection].

name: Inferno Warrior
desc: Increases HP by 20%. All enemies within 5 tiles take 30% more [DoT] and [Life Loss] will be inflicted on them. The effect can stack.

name: Heart of Each
desc: If DMG is dealt on the enemy turn, gain 100% bonus Crit and ignore 60% of the target's DEF.

name: Additional Blow
desc: Increases the times [Preempt] and [Counterattack] can be triggered during each round by 1. Single-target attack can interrupt the targets' turn and knock them back 2 tiles.

name: Defend Training
desc: Increases the times [Alert] can be triggered during each round by 1. Additionally, Alert can interrupt the targets' action and have a 50% chance to inflict [Stun] on them.

name: Shield Durability
desc: At the start of the battle, all allies in battle gain a [Physical Shield] equal to 20% of their HP. When allies gain a [Shield], the [Shield Value] will be increased by 50%.

name: Weight Advantage
desc: After DMG is dealt, additionally deal Physical DMG equal to 50% of current [Physical Shield] to the target.

name: Life Devouring
desc: Every 1 [Debuff] inflicted on the target increases the character's ATK by 15%.

name: Judgment Call
desc: If the targets' current HP is less than their maximum HP, gain a 100% chance to inflict [Stun] on them before launching an Active Attack. The effect lasts 1 round and cannot be immunized.

name: Death Shot
desc: The range of [Ranged Skills] is extended by 3 tiles. If the distance between the character and the target is no less than 6 tiles, the attacks are regarded as from [Highland].

name: Accurate Sniper
desc: Every additional 1 tile (the adjacent tile does not count) between the character and the target increases the Crit and Crit DMG by 15%.

name: Eternal Warrior
desc: When the character is defeated, restore 20% HP immediately. The effect has a CD of 3 turns. When [Resolve] is triggered, gain 15% bonus ATK and DEF, up to a maximum of 45%.

name: National Hero
desc: Increases HP by 30%. If in [Dying] state, additionally deal [Piercing DMG] equal to 200% of the character's total HP to the target when attacking and gain bonus Movement by 2 tiles.

name: Energy Overload
desc: The character can no longer restore NRG at the end of the turn. Gain 40% bonus ATK. Every 1 NRG increases Crit by 15%, up to a maximum of 75%.

name: Working Miracles
desc: Increases Healing Effect by 30%. After performing Active Single-target Healing, additionally heal other allies within 2 tiles the target based on the character's Healing Effect.

name: Roundabout Charge
desc: For each tile traversed before attacking increases ATK by 10%. Movement is possible after attacking.

name: Step Adjustment
desc: Extends the distance of [Charge] by 2 tiles. If the character moved and charged no less than 6 tiles (the adjacent tile does not count), attack again after attacking. The effect can be triggered up to 3 times per round.

name: Aggressive
desc: Before launching an Active Single-target Attack, gain 2 [Level 3 Buffs], which last 2 rounds. For each [Attribute Boost], inflicts 1 [Level 3 Debuff] on the target before attacking, up to a maximum of 5. The effects last 1 round.

name: Power of Piety
desc: If the character has less than 4 [Buffs], deal 30% more DMG. If no less than 8 [Buffs] and no [Debuff], the DMG dealt will change into [Piercing DMG].
